## Installation

You can install the development version of **northstar** from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("andrewallenbruce/northstar")
```

## Example: Payment Amount Calculation

```{r example, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(northstar)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
rvu() |> 
  filter(hcpcs == "11646") |> 
  select(hcpcs, 
         description,
         wrvu, 
         prvu_nf, 
         prvu_f, 
         mrvu, 
         cf) |>
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
gpci() |> 
  filter(state    == "GA", 
         locality == "99") |>
  select(-ftnote) |> 
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
calc_amounts(wrvu     = 6.26,
             prvu_nf  = 7.92,
             prvu_f   = 4.36,
             mrvu     = 0.99,
             wgpci    = 1.0,
             pgpci    = 0.883,
             mgpci    = 1.125,
             cf       = 32.7442)
```

```{r}
payment() |> 
  filter(hcpcs    == "11646", 
         mac      == "10212",
         locality == "99") |> 
  select(hcpcs,
         mac,
         locality,
         fee_nf,
         fee_f) |> 
  glimpse()
```
